item.title: Preliminary Results about Saturated Chase-Like Trees
item.description: Definition. For chase-like tree $T$ and its vertex $v \in T_0$, we say that $v$ mentions a factual term $t$ if $\Instance_T(v)$ contains a fact $P(\vec{t’})$ such that $t \in \elems(\vec{t’})$.
